Legal_Issue: Was the Board's credibility assessment of the applicant reasonable?
Application_Facts: The Board questioned the applicant's Christian knowledge and inconsistencies in his church membership numbers.
Decision_Outcome: The court allowed the judicial review, set aside the Board's decision, and remitted the case for redetermination.
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review application challenging the Board's credibility findings
Court_Ruling: The court ruled in favor of the applicant, finding the Board's credibility assessment unreasonable.
Claimant_Status: Applicant claiming refugee status based on religious persecution
Defendant_Behavior: Board deemed the applicant not credible based on detailed scrutiny of religious knowledge and church membership details
Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard with deference to the Board's judgment
Credibility_Assessment: Found unreasonable due to microscopic focus on trivial details
Evidence_Used: Applicant's knowledge of Christianity, reported church membership numbers
Evidence_Assessed: Inconsistencies in religious knowledge and church affiliation details
Relief_Sought: Allowance of refugee claim through redetermination
Governing_Rule: Reasonableness standard applies to credibility findings by the Board
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Focus on trivial inconsistencies undermined the overall credibility analysis
Outcome: Judicial review allowed; decision set aside and remitted
Harm_Assessment: Risk of return to religious persecution if refugee claim denied unreasonably
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee status based on religious persecution but was deemed not credible by the Board
Evidence_Handling: Court found the Board placed undue weight on minor discrepancies
Legal_Provision_Violated: None found; issue was application of reasonableness standard under IRPA
Evidence_Issues: Overemphasis on minor inconsistencies in religious practice details
Evidence_Assessment: Court found the Board's assessment of evidence unreasonable
Decision_Rationale: Credibility determination unreasonable due to excessive focus on trivial matters
Evidentiary_Issues: Disproportionate scrutiny of minor factual inconsistencies in religious claims
